sentences.en: Circumstances oblige me to do that.
sentences.cn: 情况使我不得不那样做.

sentences.en: Could you oblige me with ten yuan?
sentences.cn: 借十元钱给我好 吗 ?

sentences.en: I am sorry I cannot oblige you.
sentences.cn: 很抱歉,我不能答应你的请求.

sentences.en: I’d be obliged if you’d treat this matter as strictly confidential.
sentences.cn: 此事如果您能严格保密，我将非常感激。

sentences.en: I'll do any thing within reason to oblige.
sentences.cn: 凡能做到的我都愿效劳[尽力].

sentences.en: If you ever need help with the babysitting, I'd be glad to oblige...
sentences.cn: 如果你什么时候需要找人照看孩子，我很乐意帮忙。

sentences.en: It’s always a good idea to oblige important clients.
sentences.cn: 能满足重要客户的请求总是好的。

sentences.en: Mr Oakley always has been ready to oblige journalists with information.
sentences.cn: 奥克利先生总是乐于向记者透露消息。

sentences.en: Mr. Oakley has always been ready to oblige journalists with information.
sentences.cn: 奥克利先生一直乐于提供信息帮助记者们。

sentences.en: Please oblige me by closing the window.
sentences.cn: 请替我关上那扇窗子.

sentences.en: Please oblige me with a reply as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 请尽早给予答复.

sentences.en: Please oblige me with your presence.
sentences.cn: 务请光临.

sentences.en: Please oblige me with your valuable comments.
sentences.cn: 请大家给予指正.

sentences.en: Sorry, I can't oblige you.
sentences.cn: 很抱歉, 我不能帮你的忙.

sentences.en: The minister was obliged to report at least once every six months.
sentences.cn: 这位大臣必须至少每六个月作一次汇报。

sentences.en: The storm got worse and worse. Finally, I was obliged to abandon the car and continue on foot.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨越来越猛烈。最终，我被迫弃车徒步前行。

sentences.en: They did so without hope of further profit and out of a sense of noblesse oblige.
sentences.cn: 他们这样做并未打算进一步获利，而是出于一种义不容辞的贵族责任感。

sentences.en: We called up three economists to ask how to eliminate the deficit and they obliged with very straightforward answers.
sentences.cn: 我们致电3位经济学家咨询消除赤字的方法，他们满足了我们的要求，给出了非常直接的答复。

sentences.en: We called up three economists to ask how to eliminate the deficit and they obliged with very straightforward answers...
sentences.cn: 我们打电话给3位经济学家询问如何消除赤字，他们坦率地给予了答复。

sentences.en: We'd be happy to oblige.
sentences.cn: 我们乐于效劳.

sentences.en: Will any gentleman oblige the lady?
sentences.cn: 请哪位先生给这位女士让个座位好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Will you oblige me with a stamp?
sentences.cn: 给我一张邮票好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Will you oblige me with your name and address?
sentences.cn: 敬请赐告你的姓名和地址好 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: 迫使；强制；赐，施恩惠；责成；义务
trans.tran_en: if you are obliged to do something, you have to do it because the situation, the law, a duty etc makes it necessary
To oblige someone means to be helpful to them by doing what they have asked you to do
